review: *** This item seems to be malfunctioning, so I've been trouble-shooting what any correctable problems might be, or if the item itself is defective.  The install was easily taken care of, and the device worked properly for a short period of time, but it soon began to malfunction - quite often.  As of this writing, it is not responding to any commands.  The battery is fine, the reset options have been tried time and time again, but to no avail. I will update this rating if I'm able to determine the problem and fix it.  If not, however, I may soon be returning the device, once I check to see if it's still under warranty.  Makes me disappointed, because I'm all about Apple everything, and always have been. We shall see...
author: CrimsonBird "Sheree Huitt"
